name: U.A. Playing Manager
text:
If you Normal or Special Summon an "U.A." monster(s): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can activate 1 of these effects;
? Target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
? Negate the effects of all face-up monsters currently on the field until the end of this turn, except "U.A." monsters'.
You can only use each effect of "U.A. Playing Manager" once per turn.
